verbs.description: i [V: will] not leave the catholic church this is why i will not leave the catholic church this is why public catholic reader pagansister asked me why i stayed catholic in the face of 20 years of dark scandal involved deep failures on the part of the priesthood the bishops and as has recently come to light the papacy going back at least to pope paul vi this column which i wrote for the national catholic register catholic church church
